platform.name: ART EUction
platform.description: Where creativity drives social change through blockchain-powered auctions supporting the UN Sustainable Development Goals

hero.title: Art Meets Impact
hero.subtitle: Bid on extraordinary artworks and support global NGOs tackling the world's most pressing challenges through the UN Sustainable Development Goals.

about.mission: ART EUction bridges the gap between artistic expression and social impact, creating a transparent marketplace where every bid supports verified NGOs working towards the UN's 17 Sustainable Development Goals.
about.vision: A world where art catalyzes meaningful change, empowering artists and collectors to be agents of transformation while addressing global challenges.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: Blockchain technology ensures every transaction is traceable and accountable.

values.title: Impact
values.description: Directly supporting NGOs making measurable progress on SDGs.

values.title: Creativity
values.description: Celebrating artists who use their craft to inspire social change.

values.title: Community
values.description: Building a global network of conscious collectors and changemakers.

howItWorks.title: Artists Submit
howItWorks.description: Artists submit artworks aligned with specific SDGs, sharing their vision for change.

howItWorks.title: Curated Selection
howItWorks.description: Our team curates pieces that powerfully represent each SDG's mission.

howItWorks.title: Transparent Euctions
howItWorks.description: Collectors bid on artworks through secure, blockchain-verified euctions.

howItWorks.title: Direct Impact
howItWorks.description: Proceeds go directly to verified NGOs working on that SDG, with full transparency.

features.title: Curated Artworks
features.description: Hand-selected pieces from global artists passionate about social impact.

features.title: Blockchain Verified
features.description: Every transaction secured and verified on the blockchain for transparency.

features.title: 17 SDGs Covered
features.description: Supporting all UN Sustainable Development Goals through targeted fundraising.

features.title: Verified NGOs
features.description: Partnering only with vetted organizations making real impact.

features.title: Impact Tracking
features.description: Real-time Social Impact Analytics showing measurable outcomes.

features.title: Artist Empowerment
features.description: Fair compensation while supporting causes artists care about.

testimonials.name: Maria Chen
testimonials.quote: ART EUction gave my work purpose beyond the canvas. Knowing my art directly funds ocean conservation is incredibly fulfilling.

testimonials.name: Dr. James Okonkwo
testimonials.quote: The transparency and efficiency of ART EUction's platform has transformed how we fundraise. We can show donors exactly where their money goes.

testimonials.name: Sofia Bellucci
testimonials.quote: I love that my passion for collecting art now makes a tangible difference in the world. It's collecting with conscience.

footer.description: ART EUction is a revolutionary platform combining art auctions with social impact, supporting the UN's 17 Sustainable Development Goals.
